name: performance-tester
description: Tester performance of JavaScript and WebComponents and get beautiful resulting graphs.
author: Thomas Allmer <d4kmor@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: npm run lint:ec && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:polymer
scripts.lint:report: npm run lint:ec > ./.tmp/editorconfig_errors.txt && npm run lint:js -- -f html -o ./.tmp/eslint_errors.html && npm run lint:css > ./.tmp/cssLint_errors.txt && npm run lint:polymer > ./.tmp/polymer_errors.txt
